articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Scientists: Evidence of Crash with Another Planet under Earth's Surface - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Scientists have recognized since the 1970s that there are two large, mysterious blobs in the deepest part of Earth's mantle. One of the masses is under Africa and the other under the South Pacific Ocean.
articles.content:
One of the masses is under Africa and the other under the South Pacific Ocean.
Recent research suggests these masses, which are denser than the material surrounding them, might be from a huge crash … [+3688 chars]
